title: The Ark Is Moved Improperly
summary: David tries to bring the Ark of the Covenant to Jerusalem, but Uzzah touches it and dies. The Ark is temporarily placed in the house of Obed-Edom, where God’s blessing rests.

faq.question: Why did Uzzah die?
faq.answer: Because he touched the Ark, which was against God’s command.

faq.question: What happened at the house of Obed-Edom?
faq.answer: God blessed his household while the Ark was there.
